property.name: Rules
property.value: Spell Currents — Whenever you cast a spell, this creature gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evasive Maneuvers — When this creature enters the battle zone, if you have 2 or fewer shields, tap target enemy creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Skirmisher Rousing Pulse — Whenever this creature blocks, you may untap one of your creatures that doesn't have "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Skirmisher Stunning Appearance — When this creature enters the battle zone, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, tap target enemy creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Opening Defense — If you have 2 or more creatures in the battle zone that have "Blocker", tap 4 fewer mana cards to summon this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mystic Mayhem — When this creature enters the battle zone, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, you may cast a spell that is level 5 or less from your hand for free.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Blocker Skirmisher Contingency Code — When this creature becomes tapped for the first time each turn, untap all your other creatures that have "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Clash Tactics — While revealed for a clash, this card is level 10. Strobe Pulse — When this creature enters the battle zone, tap target enemy creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Tap target enemy creature. If it's your turn, instead tap 2 target enemy creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures gets +2000 power until the end of the turn. Whenever you clash this turn, each of your creatures gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of creatures from among them that each have power 6000 or more and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Energizing Surge — Whenever this creature attacks, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, one of your creatures gets +1000 power until the end of the turn, and untap it at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reprocess — Whenever this creature attacks, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, each player may choose up to 2 cards in his or her discard pile and put them on the bottom of his or her deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Clash Tactics — While revealed for a clash, this card is level 10. Perceptive — When this creature enters the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.value: Double Breaker Cover of Chaos — When this creature enters the battle zone, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, each of your creatures can't be blocked this turn.

property.value: Shield Blast Until the start of your next turn, target enemy creature can't break shields.

property.value: Wreckage Scan — When this creature enters the battle zone, if you have a spell in your discard pile, you may draw a card.

property.value: Foil Fate — When this creature enters the battle zone, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash and have at least one shield, put one of them into your hand, then put a card from your hand into your shield zone face down as a new shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Return target creature that has power 4000 or less from the battle zone to its owner's hand. If it's your turn, instead return target creature that has power 6000 or less from the battle zone to its owner's hand.

property.value: Vortex Evolution — Put on 2 of your Light and/or Water creatures. Double Breaker Unleash — Check the card you unleashed this creature with. If the card was Light, return a spell from your discard pile to your hand. If the card was Water, you may cast a spell that is level 7 or less from your hand for free.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution — Put on 2 of your Light and/or Darkness creatures. Double Breaker Unleash — Check the card you unleashed this creature with. If the card was Light, tap all enemy creatures. If the card was Darkness, banish target tapped enemy creature.

property.value: Ionize — When this creature enters the battle zone, choose one: - Tap target enemy creature. - Return a creature from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution — Put on 2 of your Light and/or Fire creatures. Triple Breaker Unleash — Check the card you unleashed this creature with. If the card was Light, all your creatures get +3000 power until the end of the turn, and at the end of your turn, untap them. If the card was Fire, banish all enemy creatures that have "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blaster Boots — When this creature enters the battle zone, choose one: - This creature gets "Fast Attack" until the end of the turn. - At the end of the turn, untap one of your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution — Put on 2 of your Light and/or Nature creatures. Double Breaker Unleash — Check the card you unleashed this creature with. If the card was Light, cast a spell in your discard pile for free, then put that spell on the bottom of your deck. If the card was Nature, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a non-evolution creature. Put that creature into the battle zone and shuffle the rest into your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution — Put on 2 of your Water and/or Darkness creatures. Double Breaker Unleash — Check the card you unleashed this creature with. property.name: Rules

If that card was Fire, each of your creatures gets "Powerful Attack +5000" until the end of the turn and breaks an additional shield this turn.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution — Put on 2 of your Darkness and/or Nature creatures. Double Breaker Unleash — Check the card you unleashed this creature with. If the card was Nature, each of your creature gets +2000 power until the end of the turn and can't be blocked this turn by creatures that have less power than it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Double Breaker Spellslinger — You may tap 2 fewer mana cards to cast spells. Each time you cast a spell this way, tap at least 1 mana card to cast it. Arcane Blast — All spells in your shield zone have "Shield Blast".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Marshalling Presence — Whenever you summon a creature that has "Guard", you may draw a card. Final Directive — All your creatures that have "Guard" can attack as though they didn't have that ability. Shrewd Scheme — At the end of each of your turns, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of them on top of your deck. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Void Rend — When this creature enters the battle zone and whenever it attacks, target enemy creature gets -3000 power until the end of your turn. Then you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, each enemy creature gets -1000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fast Attack Maw of the Vortex — Whenever this creature attacks, you may clash with your opponent. If you won the clash, you may put a non-evolution Void Spawn from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution — Put on 2 of your Fire and/or Nature creatures. World Breaker Hold Nothing Back! — When this creature enters the battle zone, each of your other creatures can't be blocked this turn while attacking creatures and can attack untapped creatures this turn as though they were tapped.
